channel.title: Posts on R-Ladies Lausanne
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on R-Ladies Lausanne

item.title: Interview with Elisabeth Dahlqwist (presenter #2)
item.description:
The reason I presented at R-Ladies, is, that when I had done my first shiny app, I felt it was really amazing and I really wanted to share my experience of doing that, because it was quite easy. Elisabeth Dahlqwist gave an introduction to Shiny at our second R-Ladies Lausanne meetup.
Sina Rüeger: What is the work that you do? Elisabeth Dahlqwist: I’m a PhD student in Biostatistics at Karoliska Institute in Stockholm.

item.title: News May 2018
item.description: Meetup #4 on June 7 @ ImpactHub We will have our fourth meetup on June 7, 2018, 7 pm at ImpactHub (door opens at 6:30 pm). During one hour we will have several speakers talking about different topics, each presentation will be 10-20 min long (aka ThundeR talks!). We also encourage you to bring along your R problems 30 min before the meetup starts - we ðŸ’œsolving R riddles!
